message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning algorithms, which are commonly studied in the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus on deterministic environments and sparse rewards suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper's analysis of the underlying mechanisms of convergence in actor-critic algorithms suggests that it may also be relevant to the sub-category of neural networks (cs.NE).
